description: Amendments to planning permission dated 12 July 2022 (RN: 21/07264/FULL) for alterations and extensions to the Ritz Hotel and William Kent House including the change of use of the casino to a dual flexible use as hotel and/or private members club, a two storey side extension to William Kent House, extensions to the Ritz hotel including on the site of 22 Arlington Street comprising an extension of five basements, lower ground, ground, mezzanine and seven upper floors to provide additional hotel floorspace, new and upgraded hotel facilities including hotel rooms, restaurant and spa, new entrances on Arlington Street, arrival and drop off facilities, changes to the servicing and refuse facilities, car and cycle parking, plant, landscaping and all works including demolition, enabling, highways and other ancillary works.  Namely, minor alterations to the ground and upper floors of William Kent House (WKH) and the triangular staircase in the Ritz building; and external works to WKH including re-spacing balcony columns; ground floor external door detailed with light; first floor French windows cills lowered; new soil pipe to south west fa√ßade; Increased scope of slate replacement; relocated position of access hatch and dormer; new access ladder; windows and dormer louvre modification and to junction between Winter Garden and WKH.
